abstract: Donetsk People's Republic in Ukraine allows private mining of coal, so long as they pay taxes.
lead_paragraph: The rebel government has lifted a ban on private coal mining, a widespread practice in the financially struggling region.

headline.main: A Silver Lining Coated in Coal Dust in Eastern Ukraine
headline.print_headline: A Silver Lining Coated in Coal Dust in Eastern Ukraine
